message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $1000000. As a valued customer, I want to assure you that we take pride in the quality of our products. Unfortunately, I'm not at liberty to disclose the specifics of this particular item, but I can tell you that it's been thoroughly inspected and meets our high standards. We've sold 1 out of 3 products so far, and I'm confident that you'll be satisfied with your purchase. Would you like to take a chance and make this deal?
I trust your inspection process and am willing to take the chance on this product.

However, I must admit that our latest product didn't quite meet our usual standards. I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $1000000, but I want to be transparent about its quality. Would you like to take a chance on this product, or would you rather wait for our next offering?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. Given the statistics and the fact that no high-quality products have been sold so far, I prefer to wait for your next offering to ensure better value for my purchase.
